source.7cfe8104:
import pandas as pd
check_df = pd.read_csv('../input/btcusdt/binance_btcusdt_kline_1m.csv')
check_df.info()
check_df = check_df.reset_index()
cols = ["t","o","h","l","c","v"]
# check_df.drop_duplicates("t", inplace=True)
duplication_df = check_df[check_df.duplicated(subset=cols)].drop_duplicates(cols)[cols]
duplication_records = pd.merge(duplication_df, check_df, on=cols, how="left")
print('\n\n =============================duplication records============================= \n')
print(duplication_records)

import pandas as pd
check_df = pd.read_csv('../input/btcusdt/okex_btcusdt_kline_1m.csv')
check_df.info()
check_df = check_df.reset_index()
cols = ["t","o","h","l","c","v"]
# check_df.drop_duplicates("t", inplace=True)
duplication_df = check_df[check_df.duplicated(subset=cols)].drop_duplicates(cols)[cols]
duplication_records = pd.merge(duplication_df, check_df, on=cols, how="left")
print('\n\n =============================duplication records============================= \n')
print(duplication_records)
